apply_taxes_before_coupon_explainer: Calculate taxes before applying this coupon.
category_restrictions_helper_text: Select which item categories this coupon can be applied to. If you’d like this coupon to be available to all items regardless of the category, keep your selection empty. All changes are saved automatically.
combinable_explainer: Let customers apply this coupon when there are other coupons in the cart.
combine_with_category_discounts_explaine: Let customers apply this coupon when category discounts are applied to the cart.
combine_with_line_discounts_explainer: Let customers apply this coupon when line item discounts are applied to the cart.
coupon_name_helper_text: Coupon name is visible to the customers.
delete_prompt: This resource will be permanently removed. Are you sure?
multiple_codes_allowed_explainer: Let customers apply this coupon multiple times to the same order.
name: Name
product_restrictions_explainer: If you want to limit which products can use this coupon, you can enter full product codes or partial product codes using * as a wild card at the beginning or end of the value. So abc123, fun_*, *-small would match abc123, fun_ and fun_times, and example-small. It wouldn't match abc12, abc1234, fun, or good-smalls.
repeat_price_amount_discount_summary: for each {{from}}, {{adjustment}}¤ on the next item
repeat_price_percentage_discount_summary: for each {{from}}, {{adjustment, percent}} on the next item
set_time_constraints_explainer: Limit when your customers can apply this coupon.
undo_message: Looks like you didn't save your changes! What would you like to do with them?
uses_per_coupon_code_summary: Each coupon code can be used only one time.
uses_per_coupon_code_summary_0: Each coupon code can be used unlimited times.
uses_per_coupon_code_summary_plural: Each coupon code can be used only {{count}} times.
uses_per_coupon_summary: Only the first customer can use this coupon.
uses_per_coupon_summary_0: All customers can use this coupon.
uses_per_coupon_summary_plural: Only the first {{count}} customers can use this coupon.
uses_per_customer_summary: Customers can use this coupon for one order only.
uses_per_customer_summary_0: Customers can use this coupon for as many orders as they like.
uses_per_customer_summary_plural: Customers can use this coupon for {{count}} orders only.

customer-subscription-restrictions.label: Auto-apply: subscription restrictions
customer-subscription-restrictions.placeholder: Enter a product code and hit Enter
customer-subscription-restrictions.helper_text: This coupon will be automatically applied when a subscription includes a product with one of the codes in the list. Wildcards are allowed just like in product code restrictions.

customer-attribute-restrictions.label: Auto-apply: customer restrictions
customer-attribute-restrictions.helper_text: This coupon will be automatically applied when a customer record matches this query.
customer-attribute-restrictions.name: Name

code.label: Code
code.helper_text: The string value of this coupon code which your customer will add to their cart to use this coupon.
code.v8n_too_long: Coupon code must be 50 characters or less
code.v8n_has_spaces: Please remove spaces from the coupon code

number-of-uses-to-date.label: Number of uses
number-of-uses-to-date.helper_text: For informational purposes, this shows you how many times this coupon code has already been used.

card.source_MIT: This transaction was initiated by the merchant
card.source_CIT: This transaction was initiated by the customer

delete.delete_prompt: Are you sure you'd like to remove this coupon code? You won't be able to bring it back.

coupon-codes-form.code_import_hint: Paste multiple space-separated codes in the field above to add all of them at once. Importing duplicate codes clears their usage stats.
coupon-codes-form.hidden_codes_explainer: We’ve hidden some of your codes because there were too many of them. Don’t worry – we’ll import them anyway.
coupon-codes-form.import_codes_done: All done! We've imported your codes into the system.

error.invalid_form: These parameters won't generate any codes. Please make sure that the length of the code is greater than the length of the prefix, does not exceed 50 characters in total and that the code itself does not contain spaces.

prefix.label: Prefix
prefix.helper_text: The length value is inclusive of this prefix.

example.label: Examples
example.helper_text: This is what the generated codes will look like.
